organization.$: Department of Mathematics and Computer Science

head.citation-title: A motion classifier for microsoft kinect
head.abstracts: In this paper we proposed a motion classifier using Microsoft Kinect. The main algorithm was based on Dynamic Time Warping (DTW). We tested the classifier with 7 motions. The experimental results showed that DTW coupled with human joint positions captured by Microsoft Kinect were capable of classifying the selected motions. © 2011 AICIT.

organization.$: Department of Mathematics and Computer Science
